body_html: I think generally tf had very little broadcasting. As part of making things more numpy like, we changed select to be called where. Thus would reasonably expect broadcasting to happen. There are lots of corner cases of ops that don't support broadcasting in the same way. Another is tf.constant() which takes a shape but the tf behavior is when the shape doesn't match, it just pads with the last value where as in numpy constant will use broadcasting semantics to match the shape.
